runs.comm: starts off with a full one around that off stump, pushed to cover
Early signs of aggression. Charges down the track, even as he backs away, and drives to mid-on
low swinging full toss, jabbed away off the outside edge to point
on a length, around middle and off, worked to wide mid-on for a single
Another failure for Nazimuddin. Dead plumb. Full in length, on the middle stump line, curved in to strike the pad. Nazimuddin was lazy in leaning forward
What a start from Aftab> He dashes down the track and lofts high over the bowler's head.
drifting on the pads, full, Aftab whips it away in front of square leg.
full in length, on the middle stump line, heaved over  square leg
goes for a yorker ends up as low dipping full toss, driven to mid-on
full-pitched, on the middle and leg, worked to left of mid-on
Take that. Another charge down the track and drills a slow length delivery  through extra cover
full in length, slanting away, steered to cover point
on a length, angling away from Aftab who runs it down to third man
length delivery just outside off, Tamim hangs on the back foot and dabs it away to backward point
fuller, yorker length, on the middle, stabbed back down the track
off cutter, on the middle, Tamim allows it to come in before wristing it past square leg
lands on a length, on the leg stump and curves in to hit the pad. Aftab was beaten by the inward movement and ended up playing no shot. Going down the legside
full and straight, on the middle, flipped towards mid-on
comes down the track, moving away to the leg-side in the process - the typical Tamim way , but ends up slicing a length delivery to Malinga at third man. That brings in Ashraful
Aftab tries the charge and Fernando bangs in at his rib cage, Aftab is cramped for room and fails to connect with his pull shot and the ball thuds into the mid-riff
cleaned him up. Aftab has another charge down the track and misses his intended lofted shot as the yorker-length delivery squeezes under the bat
full and on the off stump, driven to cover
short of length, outside off, cut to point
tries to shovel it away Ashraful style but fails to make contact
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, clipped away well in front of square leg for an easy single
line and length delivery on the stumps, Ashraful stays back and glides it down to third man, again just a single
pitched up close to the off stump line, driven wide of the fielder at cover
punched away towards cover, Vaas at his best here
full and on the stumps, swing and a miss and the ball rolls away off the pads
fuller and on the stump, punched back to the bowler
short of a good length delivery, 147.9 kms per hour and the ball zips past the outside edge
another quick delivery, Hasan makes room and drives it over the infield to the cover fence
inside edge and the ball rolls back to Fernando, misfiled and the batsmen scamper through for a single
full in length and Ashraful works it away towards square leg for a single
cut and a miss outside the off stump, beaten by the lack of bounce there
full and on the stumps, Ashraful makes room and drives it straight to the fielder at cover, good looking shot for no runs

gone! good length on the stumps, Ashraful goes for the slog over midwicket but fails to make solid contact, ball clips the top edge and balloons up towards point where Dilshan neatly settles under it. Bangladesh 4 down
full and on the pads, punched down to long-on for a single
clipped away through midwicket, easy two
good length and this one swung back in a touch, beats the bat and clips the pad but the impact was clearly outside the line of off stumps
starts off with line and length delivery, defended on the back-foot
worked away off the pads to the mid-on region
full and on the off and middle, slashed over point
slower one ,outside off, checks his stroke at the last minute and nudges to point
lands short of length, outside off and cuts in, pushed out to cover
another slower one, full, mistimes a heave towards mid-on

tossed-up, slow through the air outside off stump, swept to cow corner, Malinga rushes across and fires in an accurate throw at the non-striker's end. Nadif realised that he was going to fall short of the crease and dived but still couldn't make it in time
flighted delivery outside off stump, went down the track and played a neat chip shot over extra cover
full and on the off stump line, driven back to the bowler
fullish, yorker length, driven to long-on
again slow in the air, driven to long-off
on the middle and leg, worked past square leg
short of length, on the off and middle, pulled to deep square leg
low full toss, on the middle and leg, tries to pull but ends up mistiming it towards mid-off
slow leg cutter and that completely beats the batsman
yorker turns into low full toss, drilled to left of sweeper cover
another slower one, on the middle stump line, nudged to the on side
cleans him up with a yorker. It was outside the leg stump, Shakib backs away a touch and stabs at it, the ball ricochets off the pad onto the stumps.
bangs it short, outside off , swayed away
follows it up a slow off break, nudged towards square leg
round-armish action, full and outside off, play and a miss
fast and furious yorker on the leg stump, Mortaza hops to the leg-side, jabs at it and it runs off the outside edge to third man.
full and straight, dug out to point
he guns for the head this time, a sharp bouncer and Mahmudullah ducks under
lovely slower one, Mortaza has a wild swing across the line and is comprehensively beaten
comes down the track, Maharoof fires it in full, Mortaza brings down the bat in a hurry and carves it through point
slower one, outside off, sliced away past point
length delivery in the zone outside off, Mortaza takes out the front leg outsid the line and has one wild blind heave across the line. No wood on the leather, though
ah! that slower one again. Mortaza backs away, has a swing and a miss
full and outside off, chopped to third man
yorker outside off, Mortaza again moves outside leg stump and can't reach the ball
slings across another rapid full delivery outside off, again Mortaza moves outside leg stump , tries to chop it to third man but misses it
another shuffle to the leg-side, another swing of the bat and the ball clips the outer edge and flies to third man boundary
Crash. It was bound to happen. Again Mortaza shuffles outside leg stump and sees his off stump being felled by a fast yorker
short of length delivery on the middle and off, Rahim gets behind the line and works it behind square leg
fuller, on the pads, flicked to fine leg. The throw comes in from Maharoof to Sangakkara who swivels around and fires in a direct hit at the non-striker's end. Gone!
slow, short, outside off, fisted to extra cover
arm-ball, faster, angled across the batsman who fails to connect with his square drive
on the middle, Razzak nudges it to on side
yorker length this time, outside off and the ball squeezes under the bat
arm-ball outside off and Razzak is again beaten
on the middle, slower through the air, paddled around the corner
short in length, spins outside off, cut to deep point
full and on the middle and leg, tries to reverse sweep and it runs off the edge to fine leg
gets off the strike with a drive to long-off
Maximum. Floated on the middle, full, he went down on his knee to slog-sweep it over cow corner
swept past square leg for a single
The ninth wicket is down. Flighted delivery on the stumps, Mahmudullah top-edges a reverse sweep to Mubarak at backward point
full and on the off and middle, driven through mid-on
fires it in full and outside off, tries to square drive but is beaten
floated on the off, sliced over point
That's it. All over. Floated around the off stump, Razzak attempts a slog-sweep but gets a thin nick to Sangakkara.
